scripts.generate:resumes: npx resume export --theme elegant resumes/resume-elegant.pdf && npx resume export --theme flat resumes/resume-flat.pdf && npx resume export --theme kendall resumes/resume-kendall.pdf && npx resume export --theme slick resumes/resume-slick.pdf
scripts.generate:sites: npx resume export --theme elegant sites/resume-elegant.html && npx resume export --theme flat sites/resume-flat.html && npx resume export --theme kendall sites/resume-kendall.html && npx resume export --theme slick sites/resume-slick.html
scripts.generate: npm run generate:resumes && npm run generate:sites
